---

<h2>Installation</h2>

```
hugo new site MyNewSite
cd MyNewSite/themes
git clone https://github.com/weiseguy1/technode.git
```

Then edit the `hugo.toml` file:

```
baseURL = 'https://mynewsite.example'
languageCode = 'en-us'
title = "New Site"
theme = "technode"
```

Finally test by running `hugo server`
